basics.label: ENGINEERING MANAGER
basics.summary: To design, develop and manage products in the field of consumer electronics devices, networking protocols, internet applications and connected devices. Vision to create personalized experiences based on machine learning.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managing multiple work streams and teams related to platform software development for set-top boxes. Interacting with customers, vendors and multiple cross functional groups. Managing product development and supporting deployment of products.
highlights: Evangelized and led development of new middleware solution for OTT and other multimedia playback on set-tops. The middleware is being designed for a very responsive user experience, minimum copy transfer of buffers along playback/record pipelines, high performance playback of multiple contents in several video windows and content security.
Led a group towards porting of Comcast RDK platform on ST Micro SoCs for set-tops. Led a group towards porting/development of software for RDK platform for RNG150 Comcast platforms.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Worked on development of technologies in the field of consumer electronics. Led a team of engineers towards development of BD-J stack for Blu-ray Players. Played critical role in development and architecture of OCAP middleware.
highlights: Played critical role in development and architecture of OCAP middleware.
Developed Advanced Media Player; it had a Blu-ray player at its core and other network enhanced functionality for video playback.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Worked towards development of various technologies related to interactive TV set-top boxes for different markets.
